name: Spukhaus
description:
This is a short horror game made for a game jam. You must navigate the fun house in the dark, with only your flashlight to save your daughter. Solve puzzles and escape if you can.

  • Controls:
    • Walk - WSAD
    • Toggle Flashlight - F
    • Slight Jog - Left Shift
    • Interact with Highlighted Object - E
  • Credits:
    • Kelly Knowd - Lead Character Artist/Level Design
    • Robert Becerra - Lead Audio Design/Level Design
    • Tatum Kirchner - Lead Programmer/Level Design
    • Tyler Keith - Lead Environment Artist/Level Design
